channel.title: [508] Commands, Help me Please
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Finnally got my 508 up and going, Changed names, changed some other things but now I want to add some commands,
I open up comands.java but I can see a logical structure (which has to be there like : Player,Mod,admin commands)
So I try to figure out were to put player commands and I can find it so I guessed somethign and when compiling got like 100 errors...
So now I was wondering if someone could explain to me how to add player/mod/admin/owner commands or if someone could just send me a command.java with the commands I want ?
Thanks already guys Death Drown

item.title: [508] Commands, Help me Please
item.dc:creator: @limezo limezo
item.description:
@limezo wrote:

i am having the exact same problem. I get 100 errors no matter what I do to try and fix it.
The error reads for all of them
cannot find symbol symbol cmd and here are some commands

if (cmd[0].equals("male")) { p.look[0] = 3; p.look[1] = 10; p.look[2] = 18; p.look[3] = 26; p.look[4] = 33; p.look[5] = 36; p.look[6] = 42; p.gender = 0; p.appearanceUpdateReq = true; p.updateReq = true; }

Thats just one of the 100 errors that it says it cannot read the symbol of.
Please help?

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Commands, Help me Please
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

Can you upload a part of your commands.java (Include at least 3 commands and then tell me what other commands you want adding?)
Cheers bro.

Read full topic
